tool_description: Chicmi are mapping out the fashion scene in the world's fashion cities, starting with London, Glasgow, Edinburgh and Manchester. Use the Chicmi API to access our unique set of fashion data, including every fashion sale, sample sale, fashion exhibition and fashion event in each city.
name: Chicmi Local Fashion
title: Chicmi Local Fashion

api_list.name: Get Fashion Events in City
api_list.description: Get all fashion events in a particular city

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: The city to query. Values are currently "london", "glasgow", "edinburgh" or "manchester"

optional_parameters.name: days
optional_parameters.description: Show events from today to X days in the future. Either this or a static date range is required. If a static date range is provided, days is ignored.

optional_parameters.name: date_from
optional_parameters.description: If specifying a static date range, the from date, in "yyyy/mm/dd" format

optional_parameters.name: date_to
optional_parameters.description: If specifying a static date range, the to date, in "yyyy/mm/dd" format

optional_parameters.name: sectors
optional_parameters.description: Filter events by sectors. Values are "luxury", "designer", "high-street", "independent". Comma separated list. Leave blank for all sectors.

optional_parameters.name: types
optional_parameters.description: Filter events by event type. Values are "brand-sales" ,"sample-sales", "vintage-sales", "in-store-events", "exhibitions", "parties-and-awards", "talks-and-plays", "trade-shows", "bridal-sales". Comma separated list. Leave blank for all types.

optional_parameters.name: designers
optional_parameters.description: Filter events by designer, such as "chanel", "dior", "gucci". Check the designer URL on Chicmi.com for values. Comma separated list. Leave blank for all designers.

optional_parameters.name: stores
optional_parameters.description: Filter events by a particular store, such as "200" = Harrods. Check the store URL on Chicmi for values. Comma separated list. Leave blank for all stores.

optional_parameters.name: max_results
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Leaving this parameter off or providing 0 will return all results.
